simplified: 临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网

pronunciation.pinyin: lín yuān xiàn yú , bù rú tuì ér jié wǎng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: lin2 yuan1 xian4 yu2 , bu4 ru2 tui4 er2 jie2 wang3

details.simplified: 临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网
details.traditional: 臨淵羨魚，不如退而結網

meanings.value: better to go home and weave a net than to stand by the pond longing for fish
one should take practical steps to achieve one's aim
